description: Nice trail. This is part od the SIA (Sentier International Appachien). We have a magnificient view of the Chic-Chocs.
directions: Take the 132 to St-Anne-Des-Monts (180km NorthEast of Rimouski). Then turn on the 299 south. After a while you'll be entering in the Chic-Chocs' park. Follow the indication for the parking for the trail of Mt Albert.  46.4km from #132 to the trailhead.
title: La grande traversée (road 299 to La Serpentine)
